author: jstrachan
msg: Changed build targets to use classic ${maven.home}/build-maven.xml rather than reference the plugins directory which doesn't seem to work on older Maven builds.

author: jstrachan
msg: Commented out XML based dependencies which cause a class loading problem when running the unit tests

author: jstrachan
msg: Imported the old build targets from the old pre-Maven build so that the SQL scripts can now be run properly. For example
will run various example SQL scripts on a database (using Ant properties to connect) and generate some XML documents in the target directory.

author: jstrachan
msg: Ported the old build system back into the Maven build so that common sample programs can be ran as Ant targets such as
for the hello world script or

author: jstrachan
msg: Updated the build to try remove some of the less important check style errors to try highlight the most important errors. Also using Sun rather than Turbine curly bracket notations
